## ğŸ“‹ Installation

### iOS (TestFlight)

1. Install TestFlight from App Store
2. Accept invitation (check email)
3. Install F0 Mobile
4. Provide feedback via TestFlight

### Android (Play Beta)

1. Join beta program: [Play Console Link]
2. Update app from Play Store
3. Verify beta badge in app info
4. Leave feedback via Play Store

## ğŸ”„ Rollback Instructions

**If you encounter critical issues:**

**iOS:**
1. Delete beta app
2. Download stable from App Store
3. Report issue to beta-support@f0.ai

**Android:**
1. Settings â†’ Apps â†’ F0 Mobile â†’ Uninstall updates
2. Or leave beta program and reinstall
3. Report issue in Play Store feedback
